main event: On 30 June 1948, a ball of fire with an orange color and a bluish tail was observed traveling through the sky in a westerly direction in South Knoxville, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object was observed moving at an estimated speed of 1,000 mph and at an altitude of around 30,000 feet., One witness reported that the object emitted sparks from its streamer., One witness stated they saw the object for approximately 3 minutes while another claimed it was visible for about 3 seconds., No sound was reported during the sighting., The shape of the object was described as a ball.
sighted object: ball of fire with a bluish color trailing
witness description: Mrs. [redacted], wife of Major [redacted], and Mr. [redacted]
